tool.name: IDAT-to-text Converter
tool.description: converts red and green IDAT array data into tabular text format.
tool.help:
IDAT-to-text Converter
Description: R script to convert .idat files into interpretable comma-delimited tabular data. Usage: Rscript idat_reader.R --red --green --manifest Output: Consolidated output.txt file merging red + green Microarray counts and MethylationEPIC Manifest
